# This file is generated by the script SetUpCtestFiles.py
# If possible, modify the script to fix any issues with the CMakeLists.txt files
# Or you can remove this header line to prevent this file from being overwritten

file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/constant.cir ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/constant.cir ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/copper.constant ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/copper.constant ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/copper.linear ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/copper.linear ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/linear.cir ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/linear.cir ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/tags ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/tags ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
if( (NOT Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI) )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}THERMAL_RESISTOR/constant.cir COMMAND $<TARGET_FILE:Xyce> constant.cir )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}THERMAL_RESISTOR/constant.cir PROPERTY LABELS "serial;nightly;parallel;valgrind;thermalresistor;resistor")
  set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}THERMAL_RESISTOR/constant.cir PROPERTIES FIXTURES_SETUP constant.cir)
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}THERMAL_RESISTOR/constant.cir.verify COMMAND ${XYCE_VERIFY} constant.cir ${OutputDataDir}/THERMAL_RESISTOR/constant.cir.prn constant.cir.prn )
  set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}THERMAL_RESISTOR/constant.cir.verify PROPERTIES FIXTURES_REQUIRED constant.cir)
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}THERMAL_RESISTOR/constant.cir.verify PROPERTY LABELS "serial;nightly;parallel;valgrind;thermalresistor;resistor")
endif()
if( Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI  )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}THERMAL_RESISTOR/constant.cir COMMAND mpiexec -bind-to none -np 2 $<TARGET_FILE:Xyce> constant.cir )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}THERMAL_RESISTOR/constant.cir PROPERTY LABELS "serial;nightly;parallel;valgrind;thermalresistor;resistor")
  set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}THERMAL_RESISTOR/constant.cir PROPERTIES FIXTURES_SETUP constant.cir)
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}THERMAL_RESISTOR/constant.cir.verify COMMAND ${XYCE_VERIFY} constant.cir ${OutputDataDir}/THERMAL_RESISTOR/constant.cir.prn constant.cir.prn )
  set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}THERMAL_RESISTOR/constant.cir.verify PROPERTIES FIXTURES_REQUIRED constant.cir)
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}THERMAL_RESISTOR/constant.cir.verify PROPERTY LABELS "serial;nightly;parallel;valgrind;thermalresistor;resistor")
endif()
if( (NOT Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI) )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}THERMAL_RESISTOR/linear.cir COMMAND $<TARGET_FILE:Xyce> linear.cir )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}THERMAL_RESISTOR/linear.cir PROPERTY LABELS "serial;nightly;parallel;valgrind;thermalresistor;resistor")
  set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}THERMAL_RESISTOR/linear.cir PROPERTIES FIXTURES_SETUP linear.cir)
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}THERMAL_RESISTOR/linear.cir.verify COMMAND ${XYCE_VERIFY} linear.cir ${OutputDataDir}/THERMAL_RESISTOR/linear.cir.prn linear.cir.prn )
  set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}THERMAL_RESISTOR/linear.cir.verify PROPERTIES FIXTURES_REQUIRED linear.cir)
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}THERMAL_RESISTOR/linear.cir.verify PROPERTY LABELS "serial;nightly;parallel;valgrind;thermalresistor;resistor")
endif()
if( Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI  )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}THERMAL_RESISTOR/linear.cir COMMAND mpiexec -bind-to none -np 2 $<TARGET_FILE:Xyce> linear.cir )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}THERMAL_RESISTOR/linear.cir PROPERTY LABELS "serial;nightly;parallel;valgrind;thermalresistor;resistor")
  set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}THERMAL_RESISTOR/linear.cir PROPERTIES FIXTURES_SETUP linear.cir)
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}THERMAL_RESISTOR/linear.cir.verify COMMAND ${XYCE_VERIFY} linear.cir ${OutputDataDir}/THERMAL_RESISTOR/linear.cir.prn linear.cir.prn )
  set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}THERMAL_RESISTOR/linear.cir.verify PROPERTIES FIXTURES_REQUIRED linear.cir)
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}THERMAL_RESISTOR/linear.cir.verify PROPERTY LABELS "serial;nightly;parallel;valgrind;thermalresistor;resistor")
endif()
